data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during AMBUSCADE cruise from Port Royal to Spithead started at 1801-12-21
Ship: Ambuscade (5th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Port Royal Jamaica - Spithead, 1st Observer: John Colville (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 36G, 905BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
